Description: USA Auction Only! This is an excellent condition Jackson SDX Adrian Smith signature guitar in snow white and includes a new Gator hardshell case. These guitars have a very nice build quality, play great, sound great and you can't beat them for the price! The Jackson Adrian Smith SDX is an affordable way to gain access to the sound and playability of the more expensive model that the Iron maiden guitarist actually uses on stage. This one features a basswood body, bolt-on maple neck, compound radius rosewood fingerboard, Jackson pickups in an HSS configuration, white pickguard, and a Floyd Rose Special tremolo system. Neck PickupBridge: Top Mount Floyd Rose SpecialTuning Machines: Jackson Tuning MachinesPickguard: White Please review all the photos as they are a part of the description and show the guitars condition and what's included. Overall this guitar is very clean with some very minor and minimal marks on the front and back. This one hasn't seen much play time as even the unfinished maple fingerboard is still clean. The Gator hardshell case is new, no marks on it and includes 2 case keys. Condition is very subjective but I describe everything as best I can and I do have a 100% positive seller rating. If you have any questions please ask. *Shipping indicated is for the lower 48 States only. Please check my other auctions for more guitar and bass gear!
